name: clorox
description: Node.js library for colorizing text using ANSI escape sequences.

scripts.test: nyc node test.js && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage/coverage.lcov && codecov coverage
scripts.release: npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Jorge Bucaran
